page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE-HOME LIFE
page.content: It is 7 a.m. and we are all listening to the sound of Mike Read on Radio 1. It's soon 7.30a.m., time to get up, dress myself and eat my cornflakes. Mum walks in, "Look at those dirty trousers!" she yells, so it's all change. At last I'm ready and it's 5 to 9, Mum takes me to{school.} Now the work begins - usually Maths. or writing. We are thankful when 10.45 arrives beacause its playtime for 15 minutes. Back to work once again which brings us round to 12 o'clock and lunch, something not to be missed. Chips with everything! When the plates are cleared away and the tables are cleaned we are allowed onto the play- ground once again. All too soon 1.15p.m. arrives and it's back to work. The afternoon passes by quickly. Sometimes we do Art or play games.
